thread.title: $98+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest
thread.title_full: $98+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest

title: $98+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $98+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest $98+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest August 11, 2015 3:33pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Southwest Airlines has discounted nonstop flights from both the East and West coasts to many destinations in the Caribbean and Mexico, including to Montego Bay, Nassau, Punta Cana, Cancun, and Los Cabos. Flights start at $98 one-way (see Houston-Mexico City) or round-trip at $229. Tickets must be booked at least 14 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. on September 3. 
Travel for most routes is August 25 - December 16 and again January 11 - March 3. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on Southwest 's sale page. Pros: All these routes are nonstop. Cons:
